pullrequest.title: Fix use of not initialized static attribute in Light class

content.raw:
As far as I understand, static means that the pose of the entity is not managed by the physics engine, but rather is continuously updated by adding a constant rotation + translation on the parent pose (see #!/osrf/gazebo/src/c7202a7fcaf95282bbf54804f36885ad4342111e/gazebo/physics/Entity.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Entity.cc-514). 
That seems exactly the desired behavior when the light will be attached to a link rather then to the world.
